Articles.Content:
My challenge to you:

Refuel, in air, with DMP

What you must do:

Refuel a mk1 plane with a mk3 or mk4 plane.

Use DMP

Not crash

Post screenshots

What you can't do

Use RCS

Use mechjeb

Use The Claw

Points!

+10 for doing the challenge

-3 for using a junior docking port

+5 for a senior docking port

+20 if you fly the refueled plane into a cargo bay and refuel it there

+5 if the planes are pretty

+5 if you do it over land

+50 if the docking port is on top of the plane being refueled

Good Luck!
